{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Tenda |model=N300 |revision=v6 |asin=B00D3GO8R4 |price=15 |est_release_date=08/2017 |fcc_date=08/08/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |type=wireless router |fcc_id=V7TFH456-16 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196E;RTL8196E, H215161, GH09 TAIWAN; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |fla1=1 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9864G6KH-6 <!--;1719P, 66522S100ZW;--> |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192ER |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=3 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Tenda_XXXXXX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |oui=58:D9:D5,C8:3A:35 }} {{TagLine|Home Wireless Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.tenda.com.cn/product/N300%20v2.html}} (v2 CN) {{see also|Tenda F3|Tenda F3-16|Tenda FH456-16}}
*[https://www.aliexpress.com/item/Tenda-N300-300Mbps-Wireless-WiFi-Router-Repeater-Router-WISP-Client-AP-Bridge-Mode-IP-QoS-Multi/32823890227.html On '''AliExpress'''] - N300 v1 *[https://www.aliexpress.com/store/product/Tenda-TENDA-N300-v3-Tenda-N300-wireless-router-WIFI-repeater-300Mbps/123531_32444510891.html On '''AliExpress'''] - N300 v2 (C8:3A:35) [[Broadcom]] <!--:FCC ID: V7TW303R ?? ([[Broadcom]] BCM5356A1 ?)--> *[https://www.aliexpress.com/item/Russian-Version-Wireless-WIFI-Router-WI-FI-Repeater-Booster-Extender-Home-Network-802-11-b-g/32271552387.html On '''AliExpress'''] - N300 v3 (C8:3A:35) [[Broadcom]]
===Reviews=== *[https://mysku.ru/blog/aliexpress/19312.html Review on '''Mysku'''] :'''N300 v3''' - CPU: [[Broadcom]] ВСМ5357С0 -> [[Tenda FH456]] v1 ([[Tenda F3]] v1) :Flash: ''GigaDevice'' (1MB SPI), RAM: ''ESMT'' M13S64164A (8MB) :FW V11.11.1_CN -> FW V10.1.1.1_EN :FW FH456 v1 (BCM) (US_FH456V1.0BR_V10.1.1.1_en_TDE.bin) :'''N300 v6''' - CPU: [[Realtek]] RTL8196E -> [[Tenda FH456-16]] ([[Tenda F3-16]]) :FW V12.01.01.27_CN (W304 - Flash: ESMT M13S128168A (16MB)) *[https://www.jd.ru/255425.html On '''JD.com'''] ([[Tenda N300]]) :'''N300 v6''' (CN FW 12.x -> FW (2MB) W316) - [[Realtek]] RTL8196E :'''N300 v3''' (CN FW 11.x -> FW (1MB) FH456 v1) - CPU: [[Broadcom]] :[[Broadcom]] ВСМ5357С0, RAM: ESMT M13S64164A-5T (8MB) :"10022587 V1.1" is silkscreened on the board ([https://get.google.com/albumarchive/115741583454309340336/album/AF1QipOQ63Pvx0UDxJjsgTsZGXEvfJZwLD6LCc0PIKI9?source=pwa PCB images])
===Features=== :- Wireless Speed Up to 300Mbps :- Router/WISP/Repeater/AP mode :- Multi Language/Russian Firmware :- Client filter/Wi-Fi Timing Switch/DDNS :- QoS Bandwidth Control, Easy Setup, Easy Use <small> ===Overview=== N300 is a wireless router designed to meet the needs of home wireless shared internet access.
Using the latest 802.11n technology, the highest wireless transmission rate up to 300Mbps, :backward compatible with 802.11b/g standard WPA-PSK, WPA2-PSK, WPA/WPA2; support hybrid encryption and other security mechanisms, effective anti rub network; :support universal relay (WISP) mode, easily extend wireless coverage; at the same time to support IP bandwidth control, Client+AP bridge, :access control and other practical function. </small>
===Specifications=== {{SCollapse|Specifications |<small> :- Transfer rate: 300Mbps :- Networking standards: 802.11n, 802.11g, 802.11b; 802.3, 802.3u; :- Port: 1x 10/100M Adaptive WAN port supports auto-flip (Auto MDI/MDIX); :: 3x 10/100M adaptive LAN port auto-flip (Auto MDI/MDIX) :- Antenna: 2x 5dbi high-gain omni-directional antenna :- Button: 1x Reset / WPS button multiplexing (holes form) :- Power Input: 100-240V ~ 50/60Hz 0.3A; Output: DC 9V 600mA :- Size: 133mm x 87mm x 24.76mm :- Basic functions: Wireless switch; Wireless Network Name :: (SSID) broadcast switch; Channel selection: 1-11 :- ​Package content:router;manuals;Power Supply :- Wireless security: Wireless security function switch; 64/128 bit WEP, WPA-PSK, :: WPA2-PSK security mechanism; WPS; Wireless MAC address filtering; :- WAN access methods: PPPoE, dynamic IP, static IP :- Operating modes: WISP mode; Universal Repeater mode;AP mode; :- DHCP setting: DHCP server; the client list; static address assignment; :- Virtual server: port forwarding; DMZ Host :- Installation settings: Client filter; Mac address filtering; :: URL filtering; remote WEB management; :- DDNS: 88ip.cn/3322.org :- Bandwidth control, Static Routing, System Log; :- Other useful features: Mac address cloning; import and export :: configuration files; Web software upgrade; </small>}}
==Images== *[https://get.google.com/albumarchive/115741583454309340336/album/AF1QipOQ63Pvx0UDxJjsgTsZGXEvfJZwLD6LCc0PIKI9?source=pwa PCB images] - [[Tenda N300]] [https://yadi.sk/i/RNi-faDfxJhWM v3] (1541) :[https://yadi.sk/i/B595LuUFxJhWm PCB image] (10022587 V1.1 - BCM) :[https://yadi.sk/i/Vn9AOwW5xJhVe PCB image] (10022587 V1.1 - BCM) *[https://mysku.ru/blog/aliexpress/19312.html#comment1673316 PCB images] - '''Tenda N630''' v2 (4613) :[https://img.mysku-st.ru/uploads/images/03/91/97/2016/10/22/5853bf.jpg PCB image] (10013059 V1.0 - BCM)
